name: Apple MacBook Air 15" M4
description: Thin and light 15-inch laptop with M4 chip, 16GB unified memory, and all-day battery life. Perfect balance of screen size and portability for developers on the go.

reviews.review_text: 15-inch screen in an impossibly thin package. Love it.
M4 handles my dev workflow perfectly. Silent too.
Miss the extra ports but USB-C hub solves it.
